conversations.question: What are the benefits in the smoking cessation workshop?
conversations.answer: As a Maccabi Gold member, you are entitled to a free smoking cessation workshop, including medication treatment

conversations.answer: As a Maccabi Gold member, you are entitled to a free proper nutrition workshop, including 3 personal meetings with a dietitian
